scripts.build:apps: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem apps -Directory | ForEach-Object { Set-Location $_.FullName; npm run build }"
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Directory | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'node_modules' } | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force; Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'package-lock.json' } | Remove-Item -Force"
scripts.lint: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem apps,packages -Directory | ForEach-Object { Set-Location $_.FullName; npm run lint }"
scripts.lint:fix: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem apps,packages -Directory | ForEach-Object { Set-Location $_.FullName; npm run lint:fix }"
